metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15939 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in OpenCV 4.1.0. There is a divide-by-zero error in cv::HOGDescriptor::getDescriptorSize in modules/objdetect/src/hog.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-15939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopencv-calib3d4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-contrib4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-core4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-dnn4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-features2d4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-flann4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-highgui4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-imgcodecs4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-imgproc4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-ml4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-objdetect4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-photo4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-shape4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-stitching4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-superres4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-video4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-videoio4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-videostab4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv-viz4.5 - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv4.5-java - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
libopencv4.5-jni - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
opencv-data - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
python3-opencv - 4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opencv package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3').
